> <OLD>
>
> Straight Shot looks to Talon with a quick shake of her head.  Yet she
> appears in deep concentration as if coming upon an important piece of a
> puzzle.
>
> " Nope, nothing yet Talon but, there are a few aspects that kind of help ta
> narrow things down a little bit.  First, from what we have all sensed, the
> energy IFF readings appear ta be Unicronian in nature.  So whoever it is,
> definitely must be a MINION of considerable power and they must be some sort
> of authority figure.  Like a military general who is a major tactician.  And
> that means they must be strong as well as smart.  I wonder if we would come
> up with something by using those keywords ta do a digital intel search and
> see what that comes up with.."
>
> Rattrap nods.
>
> " It's worth a try. But Legacy is the only bot with that kinda access ta
> that intel.  But I bet he'd help ya do a search if the three of us asked.
> It can't hurt ta know who and what we're up against."

<NEW>

As SANTON rushed up onto the shuttle, follwed quickly enough by
WINGCALIBER the others stayed on the pad in case they could be of
other service.

TORCA looked at STRAIGHT SHOT, "You could be right." He said as he
stepped foward into the conversation, his Fuzors stepping up as well.
They were ready for action, well all except for SILVERBOLT who was
still recovering in the medbay.

"I have read the reports." NOCTORRO said. "I believe Legacy will be
here shortly as well. I am sure LEO PRIME will have a few last minute
orders for him as he get's this mission underway."

LORD ELDER entered as well. "Leo Prime is in conversation with Hydras,
trying to close the deal that Tuscon opened. If he can do that, we
might get some extra help."

He looked over at STRAIGHT SHOT, "So you think these new enemies are
working with the Unicronians?" He nodded as if giving the matter some
serious thought. "Perhaps." He looked at the others. "Noctorro is
right Legacy will be here to answer as many questions as he can
answer. He is the closest thing we have to a science expert. I wish we
had Perceptor here." He paused and added, "I mean the old Perceptor."

(TAG)

Preston
